pullRequest.title: [BEAM-4150] Remove fallback case for coder not specified within RemoteGrpcPort.
pullRequest.bodyText:
All runners now specify the coder id.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message:
[BEAM-4150] Update all runners/SDKs to only use the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.

Update the JRH in Dataflow to specify the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.
All runners now specify the coder id so we can remove the fallback case.

beforeCommit.message: Fix up JRH to also specify the coder id on the port instead of having clients rely on getting the coder from the adjacent PCollection in the graph.

afterCommit.message:
[BEAM-4150] Update all runners/SDKs to only use the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.

Update the JRH in Dataflow to specify the coder id on the RemoteGrpcPort.
All runners now specify the coder id so we can remove the fallback case.

nodes.bodyText: Please run gofmt on your code. Go uses Tabs for indentation, not spaces.
